texts: I confirm that I have read, understood and accept the Blue Badge discount terms and conditions
You need to pay a Â£10 registration charge before the application can be considered.
You won't need to pay it again if the discount is renewed within 90 days after the discount expiry date.
The discount expiry will be aligned with the expiry date of the Blue Badge - unless the Blue Badge was issued outside of the United Kingdom in which case the discount will run for 1 year.
